## ThirdwebSDK.getPack() method

Get an instance of a Pack contract

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPack(address: string): Pack;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | the address of the deployed contract |

<b>Returns:</b>

Pack

the contract
